issue.title: [CI] Try to reduce the env boilerplate used on github actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8713](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8713). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the [removal](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7081/files#diff-4e5e90c6228fd48698d074241c2ba760L58) of docker-compose named volumes the configuration gets more tolerant to undefined environment variables, so we can remove the matrix value propagations to the env variables in its current [form](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/workflows/python_cron.yml#L93-L103)
